name: Deathseer's Cowl
flavorText: "Given their bloody history, I cannot imagine anyone venturing into the southern jungles looking for the Opaya. Nor can I imagine the madman who could confront the Opayan deathseers and walk out of Torajan with one of their hoods." —Abd al-Hazir
flavorTextHtml: "Given their bloody history, I cannot imagine anyone venturing into the southern jungles looking for the Opaya. Nor can I imagine the madman who could confront the Opayan deathseers and walk out of Torajan with one of their hoods." —Abd al-Hazir

secondary.textHtml: 19% chance on being hit by an Undead enemy to charm it for 2 seconds. [15 - 20]%
